columns.name: file_no
columns.description: Unique identifier for the legal matter

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: Identifier for the client associated with the matter

columns.name: matterSummary
columns.description: Brief summary of the legal matter, including parties and dispute type
columns.example: Healthcare Solutions Inc v. ACME Corp - Employment Dispute

columns.name: area
columns.description: Area of law or practice related to the matter

columns.name: startDate
columns.description: Date when the matter started, in varying formats (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY, DD/MM/YY)

columns.name: owner
columns.description: Name of the person responsible for or assigned to the matter
